motd:
This build introduces the last major feature of Radarr, the queue! You can now view and manage your queue, including triggering a manual import when necessary.

This build also introduces the first public-alpha release of the native macOS client, you can read more about it and download the release on Reddit or Discord!

changes: Add category to the queue tile
Ability to view and manage the queue
Show root folders on the disk space page
Add category to the queue tile
Submenu for queued NZBs are now accessible via a single tap on the tile
Reordering queue items now occurs by dragging via the handle
